A Data Transfer Object (DTO) that provides pagination metadata for API responses using cursor-based pagination. This class encapsulates pagination state information to help clients navigate through paginated result sets.

## Key Components

- **nextCursor/previousCursor** - Base64 encoded strings for navigation between pages
- **hasNext/hasPrevious** - Boolean flags indicating pagination availability
- **totalCount** - Optional total item count (marked as potentially expensive to calculate)
- **currentPageSize** - Number of items in the current response
- **Lombok annotations** - Automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern
- **OpenAPI Schema** - Complete Swagger documentation with examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Building pagination info for API response
PageInfo pageInfo = PageInfo.builder()
    .nextCursor("eyJpZCI6MTIzNDU2fQ==")
    .previousCursor(null)
    .hasNext(true)
    .hasPrevious(false)
    .currentPageSize(20)
    .totalCount(1500L)
    .build();

// Using in API response wrapper
ApiResponse<List<Item>> response = ApiResponse.builder()
    .data(items)
    .pageInfo(pageInfo)
    .build();

// Checking pagination state
if (pageInfo.getHasNext()) {
    String nextPageCursor = pageInfo.getNextCursor();
    // Fetch next page using cursor
}
```
